# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth, I propose a price of $95 for you to acquire this item. This offers a fair deal for both parties, allowing you to enjoy the benefits of the product while ensuring a reasonable return for me. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
